content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Nesibe. Can you please tell me your budget for the monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest possible price, but I am willing to pay up to 700 Euros per month.

I am a student, so I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Nesibe. The apartment is 25 square meters, and we are looking for a tenant who is responsible and reliable. Based on the market rate in Munich, I would suggest a rental price of 700 Euros per month. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 700 Euros per month for the apartment.

I am a student, so I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I agree to the rental price of 700 Euros per month, Nesibe. As a landlord, I appreciate your willingness to be a responsible tenant and maintain a good relationship. Thank you for your interest in the apartment, and I look forward to your move-in.
name: Heinrich Heine
